title: General Hypotheses
question_text: Suppose you are told you will do a two-sided $t$-test for slope. Which are the correct hypotheses when written out in words?

choices.text:
H
0
: There is an association between the given two variables. H
a
: There is no association between the given two variables.

H
0
: There is no association between the given two variables. H
a
: There is an association between the given two variables.

H
0
: There is no association between the given two variables. H
a
: There is a positive association between the given two variables.

H
0
: There is no association between the given two variables. H
a
: There is a negative association between the given two variables.

H
0
: There is an association between the given two variables. H
a
: The association between the given two variables is positive.
